means: 金属丝( wire的名词复数 )

methods The specimens of the five wires were tested and compared for their elastic modulus , elastic limit , tensile strength , reverting angle , torsional strength and f atigue strength .方法对上述5种临床常用正畸钢丝的弹性模量、性极限、弹角、拉强度、转强度、劳强度等机械性能进行测试和比较。

through of drawing experiments of brass wires , the effects of ultrasonic vibration on drawing force and surface quality of the wires were discussed .系统由超声波驱动器、换能器、变幅杆、拉丝模、拉伸机等组成，通过对黄铜丝的拉拔实验，考察了超声振动对拉拔力和丝的表面质量的影响。

entry.def: A wire is a long thin piece of metal that is used to fasten things or to carry electric current.

example.ex: ...gadgets which detect electrical wires, pipes and timbers in walls.
example.tran: 探测墙内电线、管道和木材的小装置

entry.def: A wire is a cable which carries power or signals from one place to another.

example.ex: I ripped out the telephone wire that ran through to his office.
example.tran: 我把通到他办公室的电话线拔掉了。

entry.def: If you wire something such as a building or piece of equipment, you put wires inside it so that electricity or signals can pass into or through it.

example.ex: ...learning to wire and plumb the house herself...
example.tran: 她学着自己给房子布线走管

entry.def: A wire is the same as a telegram .
If you wire a person, you send them a telegram.

example.tran: 他马上给主席发了电报。

example.ex: They wired back a long list of books...
example.tran: 他们用电报发回了一长串书单。

entry.def: If you wire an amount of money to a person or place, you tell a bank to send it to the person or place using a telegram message.

example.ex: They arranged to wire the money from the United States...

entry.def: If something goes to the wire, it continues until the last possible moment.

example.ex: Negotiators again worked right down to the wire to reach an agreement.
example.tran: 谈判人员又是直到最后时刻才达成了协议。
